siteMetadata.title: rantum.dev
siteMetadata.subtitle: digital dwelling of andrew maury. digital developer @ecomloop in burlingame, ca. san matean nantucketer on a rantum scoot.

frontmatter.title: Develop a better reality
frontmatter.description: Reality doesn't just happen to us. Many aspects are not controllable in the near term. Adjustments can be made to create and develop a better reality, rather than succumbing to setbacks.

frontmatter.title: Progress is rarely a straight line
frontmatter.description: The best-laid plans of mice and men often go awry. Progress is rarely a straight line. Overcome the setbacks.

frontmatter.title: Task at hand
frontmatter.description: It's easy to lose focus and become distracted. Real changes have occurred, causing plans to change. Adjust, reassess, then focus on the task at hand.

frontmatter.title: Prioritize impactful projects
frontmatter.description: It's easier to sprint in one direction than jog in four.

frontmatter.title: Be diligent with healthy routines
frontmatter.description: Focus on consistency and quality will follow.

frontmatter.title: Develop habits with perpetual benefits
frontmatter.description: Great habits provide a continual chance for improvement.

frontmatter.title: Diligently appreciate opportunities
frontmatter.description: Three friends passed this year and did not make it to see age 38. Simply living is an opportunity to experience life.

frontmatter.title: Recognize the options and unknowns
frontmatter.description: Recognize the options and the unknowns. Control what is possible.

frontmatter.title: Small tasks unattended become distractions
frontmatter.description: Make time to handle these small tasks before they become distractions from the important matters.

frontmatter.title: Develop a rhythm to generate momentum
frontmatter.description: Wheels don't crash as momentum builds; they keep rolling. Find a rythym to keep rolling and keep from bottoming out.
